text.more:
A network made of wikipedia pages, started out with the initial nodes "Pretzel', "Caipirinha" and "Chahan (dish"). Each directed edge is a reference from a page to the other. Limited to 2nd order neighbours.

Made for task 5 of the Algorithms and Data Structure II course. https://github.com/ivanovitchm/datastructure

Further details about this specific resolution: https://github.com/Marcos7765/AEDII/tree/main/Tarefa5
text.intro: A network made of wikipedia pages, started out with the initial nodes "Pretzel', "Caipirinha" and "Chahan (dish"). Each directed edge is a reference from a page to the other. Limited to 2nd order neighbours.
text.title: A Wikipedia Food Network
